author: SA Aiyar
title: 'Ease shutdown or we may get worst of both worlds'
description: Forget caution, India should rapidly ease the Covid shutdown to revive the economy. Otherwise it may suffer the worst of both worlds — economic collapse without checking the virus. At a Princeton University webinar last...
content: Forget caution, India should rapidly ease the Covid shutdown to revive the economy. Otherwise it may suffer the worst of both worlds economic collapse without checking the virus. At a Princeton University webinar last week, economics Nobel laureate Angus Deat… [+4601 chars]
